hackathon-description-text: is a open-ended hackathon focused on bringing together students interested in one of the 3 major areas: graphic designing, entrepreneurship, and engineering/programming.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Imperial College Business School, South Kensington Campus, Ayrton Rd, Kensington, London SW7 2AZ, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How technically challenging and sophisticated was the hack you produced.
How useful is your hack in the real world and how you can monetise it.
How visually appealing is your hack and the user experience.
